text.name: Crushbound Past
text.desc:
[EndSkill] For 3 turns, lose 10 SP at Turn End
[EndSkill] When activating odd-numbered (Sloth Reson.) in odd-numbered turns, or when activating even-numbered (Sloth Reson.) in even-numbered turns, heal 10 SP
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +2 [Vibration] Count
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +(Sloth Reson. / 2) [Vibration] Count (max 3)
[OnSucceedAttack] If it's the main target, trigger [FusionVibration] into the target's current [Vibration] type
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 4 [Vibration]
[OnStartCoin] This Coin deals +1% damage for every [Vibration] on the main target (max 50%)
[OnStartCoin] This Coin deals +1% damage for every (sum of [Vibration] Potency and [Vibration] Count on the main target) (max 100%)
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
[OnSucceedAttack] If this Coin's effects raised the damage dealt by +100% or more, trigger [VibrationExplosion] 2 times; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 2

text.name: Crushbound Past
text.desc:
<style="highlight">[BeforeAttack] If the main target has 30+ (sum of [Vibration] Potency and [Vibration] Count), gain +1 Atk Weight
[EndSkill] For 3 turns, lose 10 SP at Turn End
[EndSkill] When activating odd-numbered (Sloth Reson.) in odd-numbered turns, or when activating even-numbered (Sloth Reson.) in even-numbered turns, heal 10 SP

[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 4 [Vibration]<style="highlight">
[OnStartCoin] This Coin deals +1% damage for every [Vibration] on the main target (max 50%)<style="highlight">
[OnStartCoin] This Coin deals +1% damage for every (sum of [Vibration] Potency and [Vibration] Count on the main target) (max 100%)<style="highlight">
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1<style="highlight">
[OnSucceedAttack] If this Coin's effects raised the damage dealt by +100% or more, trigger [VibrationExplosion] 2 times; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 2<style="highlight">

text.name: Crushbound Past
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] If the main target has 30+ (sum of [Vibration] Potency and [Vibration] Count), gain +1 Atk Weight
<style="highlight">- At 100+, gain +3 Atk Weight instead
<style="highlight">[BeforeAttack] For every 2 highest Reson., inflict 1 [Vibration] against all targets this unit attacks (max 3)
[EndSkill] For 3 turns, lose 10 SP at Turn End
<style="highlight">[EndSkill] Heal ([AccumulatedPastSinner] x 2)% HP
[EndSkill] When activating odd-numbered (Sloth Reson.) in odd-numbered turns, or when activating even-numbered (Sloth Reson.) in even-numbered turns, heal 10 SP
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +2 [Vibration] Count<style="highlight">
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +(Sloth Reson. / 2) [Vibration] Count (max 3)<style="highlight">
[OnSucceedAttack] If it's the main target, trigger [FusionVibration] into the target's current [Vibration] type<style="highlight">
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 4 [Vibration]<style="highlight">
[OnStartCoin] This Coin deals +1% damage for every [Vibration] on the main target (max 50%)<style="highlight">
[OnStartCoin] This Coin deals +1% damage for every (sum of [Vibration] Potency and [Vibration] Count on the main target) (max 100%)<style="highlight">
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1<style="highlight">
<style="highlight">[OnSucceedAttack] If this Coin's effects raised the damage dealt by +50% or more, trigger [VibrationExplosion] once.
[OnSucceedAttack] If this Coin's effects raised the damage dealt by +100% or more, trigger [VibrationExplosion] 2 times; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 2<style="highlight">

passiveList.name: Metronome
passiveList.desc:
Turn Start: in odd-numbered turns, gain 1 [AttackDmgUp]; in even-numbered turns, gain 1 [Protection]
- Does not stack with the Metronome E.G.O Gift. (If the said E.G.O Gift is at an enhanced state, its effect subtracts the values gained from this effect)
- Does not affect the instances of its effect applied to other allies

When using E.G.O Skill, gain 1 [AccumulatedPastSinner] next turn (once per Encounter)
- Gain 1 [AccumulatedPastSinner] at every subsequent Turn End

text.name: Crushbound Past
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
Deal +10% damage for every highest Reson. (max 100%)
- If the highest Reson. was a Sloth Reson., deal +20% damage for every highest Reson. instead (max 100%)
[BeforeAttack] When activating even-numbered (Sloth Reson.) in odd-numbered turns, or when activating odd-numbered (Sloth Reson.) in even-numbered turns, deal +12% damage
coinDescs: [OnStartCoin] This Coin deals +1% damage for every (sum of [Vibration] Potency and [Vibration] Count on the main target) (max 100%)
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 5 [Vibration] and +2 [Vibration] Count
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +(Sloth Reson.) [Vibration] Count (max 6)
[OnSucceedAttack] If it's the main target, trigger [FusionVibration] into the target's current [Vibration] type
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion] 2 times; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 2
[OnSucceedAttack] If this Coin's effects raised the damage dealt by +100% or more, trigger [VibrationExplosion] 2 times; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 2
